Package dnl.link

Class CTM

  • java.lang.Object
    • dnl.link.Link
      • dnl.link.CTM
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<Link>
    public class CTM
extends Link
    This class propagates flow according to the cell transmission model.

      • update

        public void update()
        Description copied from class: Link
        This is called every time step, after Link.step() has been called for all Nodes and Links. It can be used to finish any updating work that could not occur during Link.step().
        Specified by:
        update in class Link

      • getSendingFlow

        public double getSendingFlow()
        Specified by:
        getSendingFlow in class Link
        Returns:
        the maximum flow that could exit the link in the next time step (in veh)

      • getReceivingFlow

        public double getReceivingFlow()
        Specified by:
        getReceivingFlow in class Link
        Returns:
        the maximum flow that could enter the link in the next time step (in veh)

      • addFlow

        public void addFlow​(double y)
        Description copied from class: Link
        Adds the given flow (in veh, for a single time step) to the upstream end of the link. This method is called when vehicles enter the link! This is usually called by the Node.step() method. Subclasses of link need to call Link.logEnteringFlow(double) to update the average travel times.
        Specified by:
        addFlow in class Link

      • removeFlow

        public void removeFlow​(double y)
        Description copied from class: Link
        Removes the given flow (in veh, for a single time step) from the downstream end of the link. This method is called when vehicles exit the link! This is usually called by the Node.step() method.
        Specified by:
        removeFlow in class Link
        Parameters:
        y - the flow to be removed
